button.component_desc: 按钮用于触发某一行为动作。按钮上显示的文案(button label)需和这一行为动作相一致

module1.title: 基础样式
module1.desc1: 根据按钮的组成，分为文字按钮，图标文字按钮，图标按钮

module2.title: 状态
module2.desc1: 根据按钮的状态，分为正常，加载中，和不可点击

module3.title: 类型
module3.desc1: 根据按钮的类型，分为主按钮、次级按钮、三级按钮、幽灵按钮、虚线按钮、文字按钮、链接按钮、强调按钮
module3.desc2: 幽灵与次级按钮相似，区别：幽灵按钮背景色是透明，次级按钮背景色是白色
module3.desc3: 链接和文字按钮很相似，链接按钮没有边距宽度

module4.title: 强调按钮
module4.desc1: 用不同的颜色（红，黄，绿）来表示三种不同的强调含义（危险，警告，成功）

module5.title: 按钮组合
module5.desc1: 一组相关联的操作聚合在一起成为按钮组，方便快捷操作

module6.title: 异步状态
module6.desc1: 点击后按钮进入 loading 状态，当异步结束后恢复正常

api.icon: 设置按钮左侧图标类型
api.href: 点击跳转的地址，指定此属性将用 a 标签渲染组件
api.to: 同 router-link 组件 to 属性，指定此属性将使用 router-link 渲染组件
api.link-size: 类型为'link'时，设置链接文字的大小
api.html-type: 设置 button 原生的 type 类型
api.target: 相当于 a 链接的 target 属性，href 存在时生效

card.component_desc: 基础卡片容器，用于承载文字、列表、图片、表格等信息。

module1.title: 基础样式
module1.desc1: 卡片的组成分为顶部注释文字，卡片标题，卡片副标题，卡片内容，以及卡片操作和链接。
module1.desc2: 卡片内容可包括文字、列表、图片、表格等。

row.component_desc: 通过基础的 24 分栏，迅速简便地创建布局

module1.title: 基础布局
module1.desc1: 使用单一分栏创建基础的栅格布局。 通过 row 和 col 组件，并通过 col 组件的 span 属性我们就可以自由地组合布局

module2.title: 类型与用法
module2.desc1: 分栏之间存在间隔。 Row 组件 提供 gutter 属性来指定每一栏之间的间隔，默认间隔为 0
module2.desc2: 通过基础的 1/24 分栏任意扩展组合形成较为复杂的混合布局
module2.desc3: 支持偏移指定的栏数。 通过制定 col 组件的 offset 属性可以指定分栏偏移的栏数
module2.desc4: 通过 flex 布局来对分栏进行灵活的对齐。 将 type 属性赋值为 'flex'，可以启用 flex 布局，并可通过 justify 属性来指定 start, center, end, space-between, space-around 其中的值来定义子元素的排版方式
module2.desc5: 参照了 Bootstrap 的 响应式设计，预设了六个响应尺寸：xs、sm、md、lg、xl、xxl

api.type: 布局模式，现代浏览器下有效
api.justify: flex布局下的水平排列方式
api.align: flex 布局下的垂直排列方式
api.xs: < 576px 响应式栅格数或者栅格属性对象
api.sm: ≥ 576px 响应式栅格数或者栅格属性对象
api.md: ≥ 768px 响应式栅格数或者栅格属性对象
api.lg: ≥ 992px 响应式栅格数或者栅格属性对象
api.xl: ≥ 1200px 响应式栅格数或者栅格属性对象
api.xxl: ≥ 1620px 响应式栅格数或者栅格属性对象

api.xs: < 576px 响应式栅格数或者栅格属性对象
api.sm: ≥ 576px 响应式栅格数或者栅格属性对象
api.md: ≥ 768px 响应式栅格数或者栅格属性对象
api.lg: ≥ 992px 响应式栅格数或者栅格属性对象
api.xl: ≥ 1200px 响应式栅格数或者栅格属性对象
api.xxl: ≥ 1620px 响应式栅格数或者栅格属性对象

module3.desc1: 注: 查看更多 Feather 图标资源

input.component_desc: 用于收集用户通过鼠标或键盘提供的信息

module1.title: 单行文本
module1.desc1: 基本使用，可自定义内置标题，占位符，图标，标签，提示和验证
module1.desc2: 输入框的聚焦、点击状态，不可编辑状态，以及报错状态
module1.desc3: 1、纯输入框 2、带标题的输入框 3、带图标的输入框 4、带前后缀的输入框 5、可以清除内容的输入框

module2.title: 多行文本
module2.desc1: 用于收集用户输入的大量信息
module2.desc2: 输入框的聚焦、点击状态，不可编辑状态，以及报错状态

api.label: 标签
api.value: 输入框的内容,若需要双向数据绑定，请使用v-model
api.autosize: 自适应内容高度, 可传入对象，如，{ minRows: 2, maxRows: 6 }
api.change: 当输入值改变时触发，拼音输入过程中将不再触发，如有需要可使用 input 事件
api.clear: 当点击清空按钮时触发
api.enter: 用户按下回车时触发，在中文输入过程中按下回车不会触发

radio.component_desc: 用于多个选项（一般一组不超过 5 个）的单选输入，状态的切换

api.value: Radio 的 value
api.disabled: 禁用状态,继承 RadioGroup 组件的 disabled 值
api.checked: 是否选中,根据 group 组件的 value 计算得出
api.change: 在选项状态发生改变时触发，返回当前状态

api.value: 当前选中的值
api.name: RadioGroup 下所有 input[type='radio'] 的 name 属性
api.change: 在选项状态发生改变时触发，返回当前状态。

checkbox.component_desc: 用于多个选项（一般一组不超过 5 个）的选择输入，状态的切换

api.value: Checkbox 的 value
api.disabled: 禁用状态，可继承 CheckboxGroup 组件的 disabled 值
api.name: Checkbox 的 name，可继承 CheckboxGroup 组件的 name 值
api.checked: 是否选中,支持 v-model,如果在 CheckboxGroup 中将根据 value 值判断得出
api.change: 在选项状态发生改变时触发，返回当前状态。

api.value: 当前选中的值，支持 v-model
api.change: 在选项状态发生改变时触发，返回当前状态。

switch.component_desc: 表达同一行为两种互斥状态之间的切换

api.name: switch 组件的 name 属性
api.value: 支持 v-model，用于设置开关是否选中，使用 value === true-value 来判断是否打开
api.change: 开关变化时触发，返回当前的状态

tag.component_desc: 用于展示分类和标记属性，可操作标签为圆角，纯展示标签为直角

dropdown.component_desc: 向下弹出的列表，用于归纳同类型的项目

module1.title: 基础样式
module1.desc1: 下拉由下拉项目组成。下拉项目内容可以自定义，可以含有图标，文字和展开按钮，或者为纯文字。 多个层级的下拉见级联选择 Cascader

api.visible: 手动控制是否显示 Dropdown, 支持 v-model
api.poppper-class: 为 Dropdown 的 popper 添加类名
api.popper-options: 自定义 popper.js 的配置项，具体配置查看 popper.js 文档
api.updatePopper: 手动更新下拉面板位置
api.change: 下拉框出现/隐藏时触发
api.clickoutside: trigger 为 click 时，点击下拉框外部时触发

datepicker.component_desc: 用于日期和时间的选择

module1.title: 基础样式
module1.desc1: 日期选择，支持手动输入。支持格式yyyy/mm/dd, yyyymmdd, yyyy-mm-dd。

module2.title: 选择月份
module2.desc1: 月份选择，支持手动输入，支持格式yyyy/mm，yyyymm，yyyy-mm。

module3.title: 选择年份
module3.desc1: 年份选择，支持手动输入。

module4.title: 选择起止日期
module4.desc1: 可以选择开始和结束日期。

module5.title: 选择起止月份
module5.desc1: 可以选择开始和结束月份。

module6.title: 选择起止日期和时间
module6.desc1: 可以选择开始和结束的日期，并具体到时间

module7.title: 快速选择
module7.desc1: 可以自定义要快速选择的时间段，默认前7天、前14天、前30天、前90天

api.size: 设置输入框的大小，同 Input 组件 size 属性
api.value-format: 绑定值的格式，如'YYYY-MM-DD'，不指定则根据当前 value 值的类型进行推断
api.label: 选择器上方的标签
api.multiple: 是否可以多选，仅在 type = 'date' 下生效
api.name: 输入框的 name 属性
api.value: 当前选中的值，当多选或者时间段时为数组
api.append-to-container: 是否将下拉框插入至容器元素中。在下拉框的定位出现问题时，可将该属性设置为 false
api.get-popup-container: 获取容器元素方法，需要返回 HTMLElement 对象
api.popper-options: 自定义 popper.js 的配置项，具体配置查看 popper.js 文档
api.update-open: 当面板显示隐藏时触发
api.input: 当前 value 发生改变时触发，当为 range类型 或者 multiple 时为 date[]
api.pick-range: 当在日期段模式下，用户点击选择时间时触发
api.shortcuts: 设置快捷选项，详细查看 带快捷选择 demo
api.disabledDate: 设置不可选择的日期，参数为当前的日期，需要返回 Boolean 是否禁用这天

module2.title: 选择当前时间
module2.desc: 支持快速选择当前时刻

api.name: 输入框的 name 属性
api.value: 当前选中的值，当多选或者时间段时为数组
api.update-open: 当面板显示隐藏时触发
api.input: 当前 value 发生改变时触发

form.component_desc: 表单组件，包含数据录入样式，自带数据管理和校验

module1.title: 应用案例
module1.desc1: 横版满屏排列，一行内可以根据栅格放多个元素，但不建议超过 4 个
module1.desc2: 竖版排列，一行只有 1 个元素

api.rules: 表单验证规则，具体下方校验规则
api.show-message: 是否显示校验错误信息
api.validate-on-rule-change: 是否在 rules 属性改变后立即触发一次验证
api.disabled: 是否禁用该表单内的所有组件
api.validateFields: 对部分表单字段进行校验的方法, props 为需要校验的属性名
api.resetFields: 对表单进行重置，将所有字段值重置为原始值并移除校验结果
api.clearValidate: 移除表单项的校验结果。传入待移除的表单项的 prop 属性或者 prop 组成的数组，如不传则移除整个表单的校验结果
api.trigger: 触发条件, 非必填, 可选值: 'blur'、'change',默认两者时都触发
api.validator: 自定义校验（**注意 callback 必须被调用**）, 支持 source 参数，source 为当前表单 modal 属性值

api.prop: 对应表单域 model 里的字段
api.rules: 验证规则，将覆盖Form中该项规则
api.required: 是否必填, change 时触发校验, 也可在 rules.required 属性上配置
api.show-message: 是否显示校验错误信息
api.clearValidate: 清空表单项的校验结果

notification.component_desc: 默认 5 秒自动消失，通常出现在窗口的右上角，多个同时出现时，以纵向顺序排列。用于展示即时的操作反馈，通常用于不打断用户操作的提醒

api.desc: 你可以通过 this.$wt.notify 来直接调用组件，亦或者使用单独引用的方式调用组件
api.type: 主题样式，如果不在可选值内将被忽略
api.duration: 显示时间, 毫秒。设为 0 则不会自动关闭
api.offset: 偏移的距离，在同一时刻，所有的 Notification 实例应当设置一个相同的偏移量

select.component_desc: 下拉选择器，用于多个选项的选择输入，状态的切换。当选项少于 5 个时，建议用 Radio 或 Checkbox。

module1.title: 基础样式
module1.desc1: 分为基本选择器和带标题选择器两种。

api.value: select当前选中值,多选时为数组
api.value-key: 仅当 value 值为 object、object[]时生效，作为value唯一标识的键名
api.label: select标题
api.invalid: 是否校验通过，用于非空校验
api.validation-text: 校验不通过时显示的文字
api.no-match-text: 搜索条件无匹配时显示的文字
api.no-data-text: 选项为空时显示的文字
api.loading: 是否正在从远程获取数据
api.reserve-keyword: 多选且可搜索时，是否在选中一个选项后保留当前的搜索关键词
api.show-select-all: 多选时生效，是否显示全选
api.change: 选中值发生变化时触发
api.update:visible: 下拉框显示／隐藏状态变化时触发
api.remove: 多选模式下移除 tag 时触发
api.focus(): 使选择框获取焦点，并打开选择框
api.blur(): 使选择框失去焦点，并关闭选择框

api.value: 选项的值
api.label: 选项的展示内容，若不设置则默认使用 value.toString()

loading.component_desc: 向用户显示系统正在积极响应。

api.delay: 延迟显示加载效果（防止闪烁）,单位毫秒

api.multiple: 是否支持多选文件(只在input-type为button或input时有效)
api.data: 上传时附带的额外参数
api.name: 上传的文件字段名
api.with-credentials: 支持发送 cookie 凭证信息
api.show-file-list: 是否显示已上传文件列表(只在input-type为button或input时有效)
api.accept: 接受上传的 文件类型（thumbnail-mode 模式下此参数无效）, 请不要依赖该属性来做校验，必须要在服务端进行校验
api.on-remove: 文件列表移除文件时的钩子
api.on-success: 文件上传成功时的钩子
api.on-error: 文件上传失败时的钩子
api.on-change: 文件状态改变时的钩子，添加文件、上传成功和上传失败时都会被调用
api.before-upload: 上传文件之前的钩子，参数为上传的文件，若返回 false 或者返回 Promise 且被 reject，则停止上传
api.before-remove: 删除文件之前的钩子，参数为上传的文件和文件列表，若返回 false 或者返回 Promise 且被 reject，则停止上传
api.value: 上传的文件列表, 例如: [{ name: 'food.jpg', url: 'https://xxx.cdn.com/xxx.jpg' }]
api.slot_trigger: 触发文件选择框的内容
api.clearFiles: 清空已上传的文件列表（该方法不支持在 before-upload 中调用）

alert.component_desc: 不会自动消失，通常出现在窗口或卡片的顶端。用于展示较为重要的公告信息或通知

api.title: 标题
api.close: 关闭 alert 时触发的事件

api.value: 选中选项卡的值 (目前暂不支持数字0，建议使用字符串0)
api.tab-click: 标签被选中时触发，注: tab-drop 组件触发时 event 参数为 undefined
api.input: 标签页切换的事件，参数为当前标签页的值

api.active-name: 支持 v-model，选中菜单的 name 值
api.expanded-names: 受控，展开的 SubMenu 的 name 集合
api.default-expanded-names: 默认展开的 SubMenu 的 name 集合
api.router: 是否使用 vue-router 的模式，启用该模式会在激活导航时以 name 作为 path 进行路由跳转
api.update:expandedNames: SubMenu 展开 / 关闭的回调
api.title: 自定义菜单标题
api.href: 同 a 标签 href 属性
api.target: 同 a 标签 target 属性

tooltip.component_desc: 用于缩略信息的完整展示，不承载复杂文本和操作，通过鼠标移入显示、移出消失的方式查看

api.visible: 手动控制是否显示 tooltip, 支持 v-model
api.open-delay: hover 触发时出现的延迟，单位毫秒, 0 表示不延迟
api.close-delay: hover 触发时消失的延迟，单位毫秒, 0 表示不延迟
api.input: 当前 visible 发生改变时触发
api.clickoutside: 当前 trigger='click' 点击外部元素关闭弹出框时触发

expansion.component_desc: 用于信息的展开和收起

module2.title: 类型和用法
module2.desc1: 只能同时展开一个面板
module2.desc2: 可同时展开多个面板, 将 value 值设置成数组可同时展开多个
module2.desc3: 面板抽屉内可嵌套多个子级折叠面板

api.value: 当前展开的面板值，可以是数组也可以是单个值，当是数组时则表示可以同时展开多个
api.input: 当切换展开面板时触发

api.value: 当前面板值，必填
api.title: 面板标题

breadcrumb.component_desc: 用于页面层级的展示和页面跳转

module2.title: 类型与用法
module2.desc: 默认不展示当前页面标题和箭头。展示箭头时，点击箭头返回上一级菜单。

api.showTitle: 显示当前页标签，默认不显示
api.showBackIcon: 同时显示当前页标签及返回按钮，默认不显示

api.tag: 动态组件名，详见动态组件
api.to: 在tag为router-link下，编辑页面跳转路径

api.height: Table 的高度。如果 height 为 number 类型，单位px；如果 height 为 string 类型，则这个高度会设置为 Table 的 style.height 的值，Table 的高度会受控于外部样式
api.row-key: 行数据的 Key，用来优化 Table 的渲染；类型为 String 时，支持多层访问：user.info.id，但不支持user.info[0].id，此种情况请使用Function
api.expand-row-keys: 可以通过该属性设置 Table 目前的展开行，需要设置 row-key 属性才能使用，该属性为展开行的 keys 数组
api.pagination: 分页器，参考pagination文档，设为 false 时不展示和进行分页
api.expandable: 对 tableColumn[type=expand] 的列有效，function 的返回值用来决定这一行的是否可以展开
api.sort-order: 默认的排序列的 prop 和顺序。它的 prop 属性指定默认的排序的列，order 指定默认排序的顺序
api.row-col-span: 合并行合并列的计算方法
api.checkboxable: 仅对 tableColumn[type=selection] 的列有效，function 的返回值用来决定这一行的 Checkbox 是否可以勾选
api.reserve-selection: 仅对 tableColumn[type=selection] 的列有效，当为 true 是则会在数据更新之后保留之前选中的数据（需配合 index-of-selection 来使用）
api.index-of-selection: 仅对 tableColumn[type=selection] 的列有效，返回当前 row 在 selection 中的位置，当返回值 > -1 时则表示选中，否则则表示未选中
api.show-overflow-tooltip: 当内容过长时展示省略号，hover 时是否显示 tooltip 展示全部内容，也支持配置在 table-column 上
api.tooltip-props: 当内容过长时，显示 tooltip 的透传属性
api.current-row-key: 只读属性，当前行的 row-key
api.sortIcon: 自定义排序 icon 展示, order 为排序方式, change 则为触发排序的响应函数，详细请查看 Ones
api.select: 当用户手动勾选数据行的 Checkbox 时触发的事件
api.select-all: 当用户手动勾选全选的 Checkbox 时触发的事件
api.selection-change: 当选择项发生变化时会触发该事件
api.row-click: 当某一行被点击时会触发该事件
api.row-mouse-enter: 当某一行触发 mouseenter 事件时触发
api.row-mouse-leave: 当某一行触发 mouseleave 事件时触发
api.cell-click: 当某一单元格被点击时会触发该事件
api.cell-mouse-enter: 当某一单元格触发 mouseenter 事件时触发
api.cell-mouse-leave: 当某一单元格触发 mouseleave 事件时触发
api.header-click: 当某一列的表头被点击时触发该事件
api.sort-change: 当表格的排序条件发生变化的时候触发该事件。0.1.43 版本后推荐使用 change 事件
api.expand-change: 当用户对某一行展开或者关闭的时候会触发该事件
api.change: 当表格的筛选条件或排序条件发生变化时会触发该事件，参数为当前过滤条件 filters，当前排序条件 sorter。当筛选、排序条件不存在时对应的参数将为空 Object
api.doReflow: 对 Table 进行重新布局。当 Table 或其祖先元素由隐藏切换为显示时，可能需要调用此方法

api.type: 对应列的类型。多选框设置 selection；可展开的按钮设置 expand
api.label: 标题
api.min-width: 对应列的最小宽度，与 width 的区别是 width 是固定的，min-width 会把剩余宽度按比例分配给设置了 min-width 的列
api.fixed: 列是否固定在左侧或者右侧，true 表示固定在左侧
api.sortable: 对应列是否可以排序，如果设置为 'custom'，则代表用户希望远程排序，需要监听 Table 的 change 事件事件,需要配置 'prop' 属性
api.sort-method: 对数据进行排序的时候使用的方法，仅当 sortable 设置为 true 的时候有效，需返回一个数字，和 Array.sort 表现一致
api.sort-orders: 数据在排序时所使用排序策略的轮转顺序，仅当 sortable 为 true 时有效。需传入一个数组，随着用户点击表头，该列依次按照数组中元素的顺序进行排序
api.header-align: 表头对齐方式，优先级高于表格的对齐方式
api.label-class: 当前列标题的自定义类名
api.show-overflow-tooltip: 当内容过长时展示省略号，hover 时是否显示 tooltip 展示全部内容，设置在table-column 上优先于 table
api.filtered-value: 筛选的受控属性，支持.sync，外界可用此控制列的筛选状态，值为已筛选的 value 数组
api.filter-dropdown-visible: 用于控制自定义筛选菜单是否可见，支持 .sync
api.filter-method: 数据过滤使用的方法，支持.sync，返回 true 就会显示
api.show-filter-actions: 是否显示过滤下拉中的操作按钮，仅在单选时生效
api.column-key: column 的 key，如果没有配置的话，会尝试使用 prop 属性。如果需要使用 change 事件，则需要此属性标识是哪个 column 的筛选条件
api.resizable: 对应列是否可以通过拖动改变宽度，目前需要设置 mtd-table 的 bordered 属性为 true，后续版本会删除此限制
api.overflow-selector: 用于获取内容超长的元素，用获取到的元素来判断是否展示超长 tooltip，超出内容宽度即展示文字提示
api.header: 自定义表头的内容, 0.3.8 版本支持 fixed 属性
api.column: 自定义列的内容, 0.3.8 版本支持 fixed 属性
api.selection: 自定义复选框内容，仅在type='selection'下生效，参数中 props 包含 checkbox 所需状态属性，on 中包含 input 事件监听
api.filter-icon: 自定义过滤显示的 icon，参数 actived 表示当前下拉面板是否激活, filtered 表示当前是否过滤中
api.filter-dropdown: 自定义过滤的下拉面板
api.expand: 非 tree 情况下自定义展开按钮

pagination.component_desc: 用于当数据量大时，分开页面展示和浏览数据。

module2.title: 完整功能型
module2.desc1: 可自由选择搭配：每页显示条数、快速跳转页码、总条数。

api.unborder: 只显示数字，不显示边框
api.current-page: 当前页数，支持 .sync 修饰符
api.page-size: 每页显示条数，支持 .sync 修饰符
api.page-size-options: 每页显示个数选择器的选项设置
api.show-size-changer: 是否显示可以改变 page-size 的下拉
api.pager-count: 页码按钮的数量，当总页数超过该值时会折叠
api.show-quick-jumper: 是否显示快速跳转至某页功能
api.change: 当前页码或者每页条数改变时会触发

dialog.component_desc: 用于打断用户操作的信息提示/输入。

module1.title: 基础样式
module1.desc: 按照结构分为图标层，标题层，内容层，和操作层

module2.title: 类型与用法
module2.desc1: 用于必须打断用户操作的重要提醒，可以是成功或是失败、警告等
module2.desc2: 当按钮触发的操作需要和后端进行校验时会出现 loading 状态

api.mask-closable: 点击蒙层是否允许关闭
api.closable: 是否显示关闭按钮，同时是否支持 esc 关闭
api.visible: 受控。是否显示，支持 v-model
api.lock-scroll: 是否在 Dialog 出现时将 body 滚动锁定
api.title: Dialog 的标题，也可通过具名 slot （见下表）传入
api.width: 宽度 (当为 string 时需要带上单位)
api.append-to-container: 是否将弹出框插入至容器元素中。在弹出框的定位出现问题时，可将该属性设置为 false
api.input: 当用户操作触发 visible 发生改变时，可在此事件中阻止 visible 属性值变更来达到阻止 Dialog 组件关闭的效果
api.close: 点击遮罩层或右上角叉的事件
api.closed: 已关闭 Dialog 的回调事件
api.type: 消息类型，用于显示图标
api.confirm_closable: 是否显示关闭按钮，同时是否支持 esc 关闭
api.maskClosable: 点击蒙层是否允许关闭
api.confirm_width: 宽度 (当为 string 时需要带上单位)
api.onOk: 点击确认按钮后的回调, 支持返回 Promise, 返回action类型confirm
api.onCancel: 点击取消按钮或关闭按钮后的回调, 支持返回 Promise, 返回action类型cancel或close
api.useHTMLString: 是否将 message 属性作为 HTML 片段处理

stepper.component_desc: 用于展示多步任务，可根据实际应用场景设定步骤，步骤不得少于 2 步。

module2.title: 类型与用法
module2.desc2: 每个步骤有其对应的步骤状态描述
module2.desc3: 通过 space 自定义步骤条的间距
module2.desc4: 多适用于任务条数较多，状态流程较长，同时描述的信息较多等场景展示

api.space: 每个 step 的宽度、高度，不填写则自适应。支持百分比
api.title: 标题
api.icon: 图标 传入 icon 的 class 全名来自定义 icon
api.step_status: 设置当前步骤的状态，不设置则根据 stepper 确定状态

badge.component_desc: 用于展示提示或内容的条数的更新

module1.title: 基础样式
module1.desc1: 分为点状提示和数字提示
module1.desc2: 点状提示适用于内容条数不确定或不重要的场景
module1.desc3: 数字提示适用于内容条数确定且重要的场景

module2.title: 类型与用法
module2.desc1: 可以用于提醒代办事项、新消息有更新

api.value: 显示值
api.max: 最大值，超过最大值会显示 '{max}+'

progress.component_desc: 向用户传达特定进程的进度，告知用户当前状态和预期。

api.color: 进度条背景色（会覆盖status状态颜色）
api.width: 环形进度条画布宽度（只在type=circle时可用）

layout.component_desc_layout1: 外层容器。当子元素中包含
layout.component_desc_layout3: 时，全部子元素会垂直上下排列，否则会水平左右排列。

timeline.component_desc: 用于可视化内容随时间的状态改变

module1.desc: 时间轴位置分为左侧、右侧及中间

module2.desc1: 可以使用图标或指示颜色来表达时间节点事件的状态

api.title: 侧标题
api.slot_dot: 时间轴分割线上点内容

api.title: 侧标题
api.slot_dot: 时间轴分割线上点内容

cascader.component_desc: 将数据集合，进行分类展示和选择，建议最多展示 4 级菜单

module2.title: 类型与用法
module2.desc2: 当层级、分类较多，选用“悬停展示下级菜单”，快速预览菜单内容
module2.desc3: 下拉面板可根据场景配置 disable 状态。 在数据源中配置 disabled 为 true 来禁用选项。可以通过 props 属性来指定(详见 API)
module2.desc4: 回显选中路径，可明确提示和告知用户选中信息的分类来源。 formatter 仅支持返回 string

api.visible: 受控，非必须，是否显示下拉
api.value: 当前选中项
api.label: 选择标签
api.change-on-select: 是否允许选择任意一级的选项
api.formatter: 格式化输入框中显示的内容,labels 为当前匹配到的 label 数组，selectedOptions 为当前选中的option数组，vlaue为当前级联的值
api.no-match-text: 搜索条件无匹配时显示的文字
api.change: 绑定值发生变化时触发
api.update:visible: 下拉框显示/隐藏时触发
api.active-item-change: 当 change-on-select 为 false 时，父级选项变化时触发，参数为各父级项组成的数组

drawer.component_desc: 用于在同一页面弹出内容展示

api.visible: 受控；抽屉是否显示，可使用 v-model 双向绑定数据
api.title: 抽屉标题，如果使用 slot 自定义了页头，则 title 无效
api.width: 抽屉宽度，number 时为像素，string 时需要带上单位
api.height: 抽屉高度，在 placement 为 top 或 bottom 时使用
api.closable: 是否显示右上角的关闭按钮，同时是否支持 esc 关闭
api.mask-closable: 是否允许点击遮罩层关闭
api.destroy-on-close: 是否在关闭时销毁 Drawer 里的子元素
api.close: 点击遮罩层或右上角叉的事件

sidebar.component_desc: 用于展示页面结构和层级

module1.title: 基础样式
module1.desc: 菜单栏由菜单栏项目组成。菜单栏项目可分为主菜单栏和次菜单栏。主菜单栏含有图标，文字和展开按钮，次菜单栏为纯文字

api.title: 导航名称
api.collapse: 支持.sync，是否水平折叠收起导航
api.expand-keys: (受控)，支持.sync，当前打开菜单的key的数组
api.default-expand-keys: 当前打开菜单的 key 的数组
api.accordion: 是否开启手风琴模式，开启后每次至多展开一个
api.data: 导航数据(包含一级导航、二级导航)
api.tooltip-props: tooltip 组件属性，详细参考 tooltip组件
api.scoped-submenu: 自定义子菜单(submenu)中标题内容
api.scoped-item: 自定义菜单项(menu-item)中标题内容
api.collapse-change: 侧栏展开收起状态发生变化时触发
api.menu-expand-change: 菜单项展开状态发生改变时触发
api.data_id: 菜单的唯一标识，可以使用 Sidebar 组件的 item-key 属性进行更改
api.data_route: 配置改属性后使用 router-link 组件进行渲染，该属性可选值同 router-link 组件 to 属性，详细请参考 router-link
api.data_replace: 仅当配置 route 属性生效，同 router-link replace 属性
api.data_exact: 仅当配置 route 属性生效，同 router-link exact 属性
api.data_href: 同 a 标签 href 属性
api.data_target: 同 a 标签 target 属性
api.data_rel: 同 a 标签 rel 属性
api.data_enabledTooltip: 在菜单项被禁用时，是否可以显示 tooltip

button.component_desc: Button is used for starting an action. The button label text should reflect the action.

module1.title: Basic Style
module1.desc1: The button component includes: Text Button, Text + Icon Button, and Icon Button.

module2.title: Status
module2.desc1: The button component has normal, loading, and disable status.

module3.title: Type
module3.desc1: Button component includes 8 different types: Primary Button, Secondary Button, Tertiary Button, Ghost Button, Dashed-line Button, Text Button, Link Button, and Emphasis Button.
module3.desc2: Ghost button is similar to secondary button, the main difference here is that ghost button has a transparent background while the secondary button has a white background.
module3.desc3: Link is similar to text button, but without paddings.

module4.title: Emphasis Button
module4.desc1: We use three different colors (Red, Yellow, Green) to emphasis different status (Error, Warning, Success).

module5.title: Button Group
module5.desc1: A series of related actions can be combined into button groups, to improve usability.

module6.title: Loading Status
module6.desc1: You can also add a loading status to a clicked button to imform the user the system is running, after the loading complete, the button is back to normal status.

api.href: Set the redirect link after clicking the button, this property uses tag a render property
api.to: Same as 'to' property in router-link component, this property uses router-link render property
api.link-size: Set the font size of 'link' type button
api.html-type: Set the original html type of the button
api.target: Similar to tag a target property, this property exist when href detected

card.component_desc: Basic container, use for holding content like text, list, picture, table, etc.

module1.title: Basic Style
module1.desc1: Default card contains description, title, subtitle, card content, action items, and links.
module1.desc2: Card content could be text, list, picture, table, etc.

row.component_desc: Use the 24-column system to create layout easily.

module1.title: Basic Grid
module1.desc1: Use row to create simple horizontal containers. Within row, use col and span to create different combinations of elements that span any number of columns.

module2.title: Type and Use Cases
module2.desc1: Gutters exist between columns. You can set gutters under row component, the default gutter is 0.
module2.desc2: By mixing columns with differnt span under the 24-grid system, you can easily create different layout.
module2.desc3: Support column starting from specific position by specifying offset.
module2.desc4: Use flex property to have flexible alginment, by adding flex as well as justify value (start, center, end, space-between, space-around), you can define the layout alignment as shown below.
module2.desc5: Tetris grid system referes to Bootstrap Responsive Design，and have 6 responsive presets：xs、sm、md、lg、xl、xxl.

api.type: The layout of the grid, effective for modern browser
api.span: The number of columns one raster occupied
api.offset: The number of columns to offset raster from left
api.push: The number of columns that raster is moved to the right
api.pull: The number of columns that raster is moved to the left
api.xs: < 576px, could be a span value or an object containing above props
api.sm: ≥ 576px, could be a span value or an object containing above props
api.md: ≥ 768px, could be a span value or an object containing above props
api.lg: ≥ 992px, could be a span value or an object containing above props
api.xl: ≥ 1200px, could be a span value or an object containing above props
api.xxl: ≥ 1620px, could be a span value or an object containing above props

api.span: The number of columns one raster occupied
api.offset: The number of columns to offset raster from left
api.push: The number of columns that raster is moved to the right
api.pull: The number of columns that raster is moved to the left
api.xs: < 576px, could be a span value or an object containing above props
api.sm: ≥ 576px, could be a span value or an object containing above props
api.md: ≥ 768px, could be a span value or an object containing above props
api.lg: ≥ 992px, could be a span value or an object containing above props
api.xl: ≥ 1200px, could be a span value or an object containing above props
api.xxl: ≥ 1620px, could be a span value or an object containing above props

module3.desc1: Note: See more Feather icon resources

api.name: The name of the icon
api.strokeWidth: The line thickness of the icon

input.component_desc: Use for collecting mouse/keyboard input from user.

module1.title: Single-line Input
module1.desc1: Basic usage, you can customize label, placeholder, icon, prefix & suffix, hint, and validation.
module1.desc2: Single-line Input has focused, clicked, disabled, and invalid status.
module1.desc3: 1. Text Input 2. Input with label 3. Input with Icon 4. Input with prefix/suffix 5. Input with clear function.

module2.title: Multi-line Input
module2.desc1: Use for collecting large quantity data from user.
module2.desc2: Multi-line Input has focused, clicked, disabled, and invalid status.

api.label: Label
api.max-length: The max length of the input value
api.value: The content of the input, please use v-model if two-way data bind is required
api.autosize: Responsive height, support object, for example, {minRows: 2, maxRows: 6}
api.prefix: The icon slot before input value
api.suffix: The icon slot after input value
api.change: Trigged when input value changed but won't trigger during Chinese Pinyin input. Please use input if trigger is needed
api.enter: Triggered when press keyboard 'enter', won't trigger during Chinese Pinyin input

radio.component_desc: Use for Single-choice input (normally no more than 5) or change of status

api.value: Set the radio value property
api.disabled: Disable property, can inherit RadioGroup component disabled property
api.checked: Whether selected, defined by group component value
api.change: Triggered when status change, return current status

api.value: Current selected value
api.name: All the input [type='radio'] name properties under RadioGroup
api.change: Triggered when status change, return current status

checkbox.component_desc: Use for multi-choice input (normally no more than 5) or change of status

api.value: Set the checkbox value property
api.disabled: Disable property, can inherit CheckboxGroup component disabled property
api.name: Name property, can inherit CheckboxGroup component name property
api.checked: Checked status, supports v-model. If checkbox is part of a CheckboxGroup, it will be defined by the value property
api.change: Triggered when status change, return current status

api.value: Current selected value, supports v-model
api.change: Triggered when status change, return current status

switch.component_desc: Show the boolean status change of the same action.

api.name: The name property of the switch component
api.value: Support v-model, used for setting whether the switch is turned on, use value === true-value to check if it is turned on
api.true-value: The value when the switch is turned on
api.false-value: The value when the switch is turned off
api.change: Triggered when status change, return current status

tag.component_desc: Use for showing/tagging category & property. The clickable tag has a rounded border while the display tag has a square border.

api.click: The return value of the click event
api.close: The return value of the close event

dropdown.component_desc: Use for expanding a list of similar types of content downwards

module1.title: Basic Style
module1.desc1: Dropdown is made of dropdown content. You can customize dropdown content, with icon, text, button, etc. If you need multiple layers, you can use Cascader.

api.visible: Whether to show dropdown, support v-model
api.poppper-class: Add the category name of the dropdown popper
api.trigger: The trigger behavior of the dropdown
api.popper-options: The customized popper.js config, please read popper.js for more details
api.change: Triggered when dropdown shows/hides
api.clickoutside: When triggered by clicking, triggered by clicking the outside area of dropdown

datepicker.component_desc: Used for date and time selection.

module1.title: Basic Style
module1.desc1: Date selection, support manual input. The format is YYYYMMDD, YYYYMMDD, and YYYY-MM-DD.

module2.title: Select month
module2.desc1: The value can be manually entered. The format is YYYY/MM, YYYYMM, and YYYY-MM.

module4.title: Select start and end dates
module4.desc1: Start and end dates can be selected.

module5.title: Select start and end months
module5.desc1: Start and end months can be selected.

module6.title: Select start time and end time
module6.desc1: Start and end dates can be selected and specific to the time.

module7.title: Quick select
module7.desc1: You can customize the first 7 days, last 14 days, last 30 days, and last 90 days by default.

api.size: Set the size of the Input field, the same as the Input component size property.
api.value-format: The format of the binding value, such as YYYY-MM-DD, is not specified. The binding value is inferred based on the type of the current value.
api.label: The tag above the selector.
api.multiple: Whether multiple options are allowed, only work when type = 'date'.
api.placement: The default orientation of the panel is displayed.
api.name: The name property of the input box.
api.value: The currently selected value is an array when multiple selections or time periods occur.
api.placeholder: Enter the placeholder content of the box.
api.popper-class: The class name of the drop - down box.
api.append-to-container: Whether to insert a drop-down box into a container element. If there is a problem locating the drop-down box, set this property to false.
api.get-popup-container: To get a container element method, return the HTMLElement object.
api.popper-options: Customize Ppopper.js configuration items. For details, see the popper.js document.
api.week-start: Set the start date of a week.
api.update-open: Triggered when panel is shown or hidden.
api.input: Triggered when the current value is changed, or date if range or multiple [].
api.pick-range: Triggered when the user clicks to select a time in Date mode.
api.shortcuts: Set shortcut options, detailed view with Demo of shortcut selection.
api.disabledDate: Set an unselectable date. The parameter is the current date. Boolean is required to disable this date.

module2.title: Select current time
module2.desc: Supports quick selection of the current time.

module3.title: Select a time range
module3.desc: Support to select start time and end time.

api.placement: The default orientation of the panel is displayed.
api.name: The name property of the input box.
api.value: The currently selected value is an array when multiple selections or time periods occur.
api.disabled-hours: These hours are not allow to be select.
api.disabled-minutes: These minutes are not allow to be select.
api.disabled-seconds: These seconds are not allow to be select.
api.popper-class: The class name of the drop - down box.
api.update-open: Triggered when panel is shown or hidden.
api.input: Triggered when the current value is changed.

form.component_desc: Form component, including data entry style, comes with data management and verification.

module1.title: Application Cases
module1.desc1: Horizontal layout full screen, a row can be placed according to the grid elements, but do not recommend more than 4.
module1.desc2: Vertical arrangement with only one element in a row.

api.rules: Form verification rules, specific verification rules below.
api.show-message: Whether to display verification error information.
api.validate-on-rule-change: Whether to trigger validation immediately after the Rules attribute changes.
api.disabled: Whether to disable all components in the form.
api.validateFields: This parameter specifies the props for verifying some form fields. The props is the name of the attribute to be verified.
api.resetFields: Reset the form, resetting all field values to their original values and removing validation results.
api.clearValidate: Removes the validation result of a form item. Pass the prop property of the item to be removed or an array of prop. If not, remove the validation result of the entire form.
api.trigger: Condition of trigger. Optional values: 'blur', 'change'. Both are triggered by default.
api.validator: Custom validation (** note that callback must be called **) and supports the source parameter, which is the value of the current modal attribute in the form.

api.prop: Correspond to fields in the form field model.
api.rules: Validates the rule that overrides the rule in the Form.
api.required: Required or not. Validation is triggered with change. It can also be configured on the rules.required property.
api.show-message: Whether to display verification error information.
api.clearValidate: Clears the validation result of a form item.

notification.component_desc: By default disappear in 5 seconds,usually shown in the top right corner. If there are multipe alerts, shown one by one vertically. Used for immediately response to a user action, working as non-interrupt notifications.

api.desc: You can use this.$wt.notify to call this component, or call it through independent citation.
api.type: Theme style,will be ignored if the value set is not useable
api.duration: Shown duration time by millisecond. Set 0 and it won't disappear automatically.
api.offset: Offset, all Notification entities share the same offset value at the same time.

select.component_desc: Dropdown select, used for selecting from multiple options or states. If there are no more than 5 options, please use Radio or Checkbox instead.

module1.title: Basic Style
module1.desc1: Select with a title or pure select without title

api.value: Value of selected options, use array if multiple options get selected
api.value-key: Only used when the value property is object/object[], as the key name
api.label: select title
api.invalid: Whether to bypass not empty validation
api.validation-text: Error message showed when validation fails
api.filterable: Whether to enable search in choices
api.no-match-text: Message showed when there is no matched result
api.no-data-text: Message showed when there is no opion
api.reserve-keyword: Use for multiple options search select, whether to keep the last searched word when select an option
api.show-select-all: Use for multiple search, whether to show select-all
api.change: Triggered when the selected option changes
api.update:visible: Triggered when the dropdown menu show/hide changes
api.remove: Use for multiple select, triggered when removing one selected tag
api.focus(): Focus on the select and open its dropdown menu
api.blur(): Select lost focus and close its dropdown menu

api.value: Value of the option
api.label: Text that represents label for option, might be different from value, default property is value.toString()

loading.component_desc: Feedback to user that the system is still working actively.

api.delay: Delay to show the loading effect and avoide blinks, by milliseconds

upload.component_desc: Upload the file to the server

api.headers: Set the request header for the upload.
api.multiple: Whether multiple file selection is supported (valid only when input-type is button or input).
api.data: Additional parameters that come with the upload.
api.name: Field name of the file to be uploaded.
api.show-file-list: Whether to display list of uploaded files (valid only when input-type is button or input).
api.accept: Accept the type of file uploaded (invalid in thumbnail-mode mode). Do not rely on this property for verification. It must be verified on the server.
api.on-remove: File list Hooks for removing files.
api.on-success: Hook when a file is uploaded successfully.
api.on-error: Hook when a file is uploaded failed.
api.on-change: This hook is called when the file status changes. It is called when adding a file, uploading a file successfully, and uploading a file fails.
api.before-upload: The hook before the file is uploaded. If it returns False or a Promise is returned reject, the upload is stopped.
api.before-remove: Delete the hook before the file. Take the uploaded file and file list. If False or Promise is returned and rejected, the upload is stopped.
api.value: Upload file list, such as: [{name: 'food. JPG, url: 'https://xxx.cdn.com/xxx.jpg'}]
api.slot_trigger: Triggers the contents of the file selection box.
api.clearFiles: Empty the list of uploaded files (this method is not supported in before-upload).

alert.component_desc: Won't disappear automatically, shown on the top of window or card, for relatively important announcements or notifications.

api.title: Title
api.close: Event triggered by closing the alert

tab.component_desc: For switching in different functions or information sections

api.value: Value of selected Tab(Don't support number 0, use string '0' instead if necessary).
api.number: Number value of the Tab(please use positive number).
api.tab-click: Triggered when the Tab gets selected. when tab-drop triggers, event parameter is 'undefined'.
api.input: event of Tab switching, use value of the current tab as parameter.

api.active-name: Support V-model, the name value of the selected menu
api.expanded-names: Controlled, expanded SubMenu collection of names
api.default-expanded-names: The name collection of the default expanded SubMenu
api.router: Specifies whether to use the Vue-router mode. If this mode is enabled, Name is used as the path for route forwarding when the navigation is activated
api.select: Triggered when the menu (MenuItem) is selected
api.title: Customize the menu title
api.href: Same as the href attribute of the tag
api.target: Same as the target attribute of the tag

tooltip.component_desc: A complete display of abbreviated information, without complex text and operations, viewed by mouse in display or mouse out disappear.

api.visible: Manually control whether to display tooltip, support v-model
api.open-delay: The delay that occurs when the hover is triggered, in milliseconds, with 0 indicating no delay
api.close-delay: The delay that disappears when the hover is triggered, in milliseconds, with 0 indicating no delay
api.clickoutside: Trigger when the current trigger='click' is triggered when an external element is clicked to close the popup

expansion.component_desc: Use to expand and collapse information.

module2.title: Type and Use Cases
module2.desc1: Only one panel can be expanded at a time.
module2.desc2: Multiple panels can be expanded simultaneously. Setting values to an array can be expanded simultaneously.
module2.desc3: Multiple sub-level folding panels can be nested in the panel drawer.

api.value: The current expanded panel value can be an array or a single value. When it is an array, it means that multiple values can be expanded simultaneously.
api.input: Triggered when toggles the expanded panel.

api.value: Current panel value, mandatory.
api.title: The panel title.

breadcrumb.component_desc: Used for page-level display and page hopping.

module2.title: Type and Use Cases
module2.desc: The current page title and arrow are not displayed by default. When the arrow is displayed, click the arrow to return to the upper-level menu.

api.showTitle: Displays the current TAB. Default is not displayed
api.showBackIcon: Display the current TAB and the back button at the same time. Default is not displayed

api.tag: Dynamic component names, see dynamic components
api.to: When the tag is router-link, edit the redirect path

table.component_desc: Used to display column and column data

api.height: Table height. If height is Number, the unit is px; If height is String, the height is set to the value of the Table's style.height, and the Table's height is controlled by the external style.
api.row-key: Key of row data, used to optimize Table rendering; If the type is String, user.info.id is supported, but user.info[0].id is not supported. In this case, please use Function.
api.expand-row-keys: This property can be used to set the current expanded row of the Table. To use this property, you need to set the row-key property, which is the keys array of the expanded row.
api.pagination: Pager, refer to Pagination document, set to false not to display and paginate.
api.expandable: This is valid for columns of tableColumn[type=expand], and the return value of function is used to determine whether this row can be expanded.
api.sort-order: Default ordination of prop and order. Its prop property specifies the default sort column, and order specifies the default sort order.
api.row-col-span: The calculation method of merging rows and columns.
api.selection: The value selected for the current table.
api.checkboxable: This is valid only for columns of tableColumn[type=selection]. The return value of function is used to determine whether the Checkbox of this row can be checked.
api.reserve-selection: This parameter is valid only for tableColumn[type=selection] columns. If true, the previously selected data will be preserved after the data is updated (use with index-of-selection).
api.index-of-selection: This parameter is valid only for columns of tableColumn[type=selection] and returns the position of the current row in selection. If the value > -1, the row is selected. Otherwise, the row is not selected.
api.show-overflow-tooltip: If the content is too long, ellipses are displayed. If the content is hover, whether to display tooltip to display all content can also be configured on table-column.
api.tooltip-props: Displays the passthrough properties of the Tooltip when the content is too long.
api.highlight-current-row: Whether to highlight the current row.
api.current-row-key: Read-only property, row-key of current row.
api.sortIcon: Custom sort icon display, order is the sort mode, change is the response function that triggers the sort.
api.select: Event triggered when the user manually checks the Checkbox of a data row.
api.select-all: Event triggered when the user manually checks a Checkbox that is all selected.
api.selection-change: This event is triggered when the selection changes.
api.row-click: This event is triggered when a cell is clicked.
api.row-mouse-enter: Triggered when a row fires the MouseEnter event.
api.row-mouse-leave: Triggered when a cell fires the Mouseleave event.
api.cell-mouse-enter: Triggered when a cell fires the MouseEnter event.
api.cell-mouse-leave: Triggered when a cell fires the MouseOver event.
api.header-click: Triggered when the header of column be clicked.
api.sort-change: Triggered when the table's sorting criteria change. After 0.1.43, the change event is recommended.
api.expand-change: Triggered when the user expands or closes a row.
api.change: Triggered when the filter condition or sorting condition of the table changes. The parameter is the current filter condition and the current sorting condition sorter. When the filter or sort condition does not exist, the corresponding parameter is empty Object.
api.doReflow: Relayout the Table. This method may need to be called when the Table or its ancestor elements are switched from hidden to displayed.

api.type: Type of the corresponding column. Multiple selection selection; Expandable buttons set Expand.
api.label: Title
api.prop: The field name corresponding to the column contents.
api.width: The width of the corresponding column.
api.min-width: The minimum width of the corresponding column. The difference from width is that width is fixed, and min-width proportionally allocates the remaining width to the column that is set to min-width.
api.fixed: Whether the column is fixed to the left or right, true means fixed to the left.
api.sortable: Whether the corresponding column can be sorted. If the value is set to 'custom', it indicates that the user wants to sort the Table remotely and needs to listen for the change event event of the Table. The property 'prop' needs to be configured.
api.sort-method: This method is valid only when sorTable is set to true. A number must be returned, which is the same as Array.sort.
api.sort-orders: Rotation order in which data is sorted using the sort policy, valid only if sortable is true. You need to pass in an array, and as the user clicks on the table header, the columns are sorted in order of the elements in the array.
api.header-align: Table header alignment, which has a higher priority than table alignment.
api.label-class: The custom class name of the current column header.
api.show-overflow-tooltip: If the content is too long, ellipses are displayed. If the content is hover, whether to display tooltip displays all the content, and set it to display all the content on table-column rather than table.
api.filters: Filter menu items for the table header.
api.filtered-value: Controlled properties of the filter. Support .sync, which controls the filter status of the column, and the value is an array of filtered values.
api.filter-dropdown-visible: Used to control whether custom filter menus are visible. Support .sync.
api.filter-method: Data filtering method, support .sync, return true will be displayed.
api.show-filter-actions: Specifies whether to display the operation button in the filter drop-down list. This parameter takes effect only when the option is selected.
api.column-key: The key for column, if not configured, will try to use the prop property. If you want to use the change event, you need this attribute to identify the filter for which column it is.
api.resizable: Whether the width of the corresponding column can be changed by dragging it, you must set the bordered property of the wt-table to true. This restriction will be deleted in later versions.
api.overflow-selector: Used to get an element with very long content, which is used to determine whether to display a very long tooltip, or to display a text prompt beyond the content width.
api.header: Customize the content of the table header. Version 0.3.8 supports fixed attribute.
api.column: Customize column content, version 0.3.8 supports fixed attribute.
api.selection: This parameter is valid only when type='selection'. The props parameter contains the required state properties for the checkbox. The on parameter contains the input event listener.
api.filter-icon: Set the icon to be filtered. Actived indicates whether the drop-down panel is activated. Filtered indicates whether the drop-down panel is being filtered.
api.filter-dropdown: A drop-down panel for custom filtering.
api.expand: Customize the expansion button in the non-tree case.

pagination.component_desc: It is used to display and browse data separately when there is a large amount of data.

module2.title: Full Functional
module2.desc1: Optional collocation: display number of pages per page, quick jump page number, total number of pages.

api.current-page: Current page count, support the.sync modifier
api.page-size: Displays the number of entries per page, support the.sync modifier
api.show-size-changer: Determine whether page-size can be changed
api.show-total: Whether to display the total number
api.pager-count: The number of page buttons that fold when the total number of pages exceeds this value
api.show-quick-jumper: Whether to display the quick jump button
api.change: Triggered when the current page number or number of pages per page changes

dialog.component_desc: Information prompt/input used to interrupt a user's operation.

module1.title: Basic Style
module1.desc: According to the structure, it is divided into icon layer, title layer, content layer, and operation layer.

module2.title: Type and Use Cases
module2.desc1: An important reminder that must interrupt the user's action. It can be a success or failure, a warning, etc.
module2.desc2: When the operation triggered by a button needs to be verified with the backend, Loading state occurs.

api.mask: Whether a mask layer is required
api.mask-closable: Click whether the mask is allowed to close
api.closable: Whether to display the close button and whether to support ESC shutdown
api.visible: Controlled. Whether to display, V-model is supported
api.lock-scroll: Whether to scroll lock the body when the Dialog appears
api.title: The title of the Dialog, which can also be passed in through the named slot (see table below)
api.width: Width (When use string, need to put the unit)
api.append-to-container: Whether to insert a pop-up box into a container element. If there is a problem locating the pop-up box, set this property to false
api.input: When a user action triggers a visible change, you can prevent the visible property value from changing in this event to prevent the Dialog component from closing
api.open: Triggered when a pop-up box is opened
api.close: Click on the mask layer or the upper right fork of the event
api.type: Message type, used to display ICONS
api.confirm_closable: Whether to display the close button and whether to support ESC shutdown
api.maskClosable: Whether the mask is allowed to close when click
api.okButtonText: Determine the text content of the button
api.showOkButton: Whether to display the OK button
api.cancelButtonText: The text content of the cancel button
api.showCancelButton: Whether to display the cancel button
api.confirm_width: Width (When use string, need to put the unit)
api.onOk: The callback after clicking the Confirm button returns a Promise and the Action type confirm
api.onCancel: Callbacks after clicking the Cancel or close button can return a Promise and Action type Cancel or close
api.useHTMLString: Whether to treat the Message property as an HTML fragment

stepper.component_desc: It is used to display multi-step tasks. The steps can be set according to the actual application scenarios, the steps can be no less than two.

module2.title: Type and Use Cases
module2.desc2: Each step has its corresponding step status description
module2.desc3: Use space to customize the spacing of step bars
module2.desc4: It is applicable to scenarios with a large number of tasks, a long status flow, and a large amount of description information

api.space: The width and height of each step are self-adaptive if they are not specified. Support percentage
api.status: Specifies the status of the current step
api.title: Title
api.icon: Icon, the full class name of the icon is passed to customize the icon
api.step_status: Sets the state of the current step, or determines the state according to stepper

badge.component_desc: An update to the number of items used to display tips or content.

module1.title: Basic Style
module1.desc1: Divided into dot prompt and digital prompt.
module1.desc2: Dot tips are suitable for scenarios where the number of content items is uncertain or insignificant.
module1.desc3: Numeric prompts are suitable for scenarios where the number of content items is determined and important.

module2.title: Type and Use Cases
module2.desc1: Can be used to alert agents, new information has been updated.

api.value: According to the value
api.max: Maximum value, beyond which '{Max}+' is displayed

progress.component_desc: Communicate the progress of a particular process to the user and inform the user of current status and expectations.

api.color: Progress bar background color (status status color will be overwritten)
api.width: Circular progress bar canvas width (only available when type=circle)

layout.component_desc_layout1: Out container, when a child element contains
layout.component_desc_layout3: ,all child elements will be arranged vertically up and down, otherwise they will be arranged horizontally left and right.

timeline.component_desc: Used to visualize changes in the state of content over time.

module1.desc: Time axis position is divided into left, right and middle.
module1.subtitle1: The timeline is on the left
module1.subtitle2: The timeline is on the right
module1.subtitle3: The timeline is in the middle

module2.desc1: You can use icon or indicator color to express the status of events at a time node

api.type: Defines the type of the timeline
api.status: Define the state of the timeline
api.title: Aside title
api.slot_dot: The points on the timeline's dividing line

api.type: Defines the type of the timeline
api.status: Define the state of the timeline
api.title: Aside title
api.slot_dot: The points on the timeline's dividing line

cascader.component_desc: Display and select data sets by category. It is recommended to display a maximum of 4 menus.

module2.title: Type and Use Cases
module2.subtitle1: Parent node or child node is optional
module2.desc2: When there are many levels and categories, select 'Hover to display lower-level menu' to quickly preview menu content
module2.desc3: The disable state can be configured based on scenarios. Set disabled to true in the data source to disable options. This can be specified via the props property (see API)
module2.desc4: If the selected path is displayed, you can be prompted and informed of the category source of the selected information. Formatter Only string is supported

api.visible: Controlled, optional, whether to display dropdown
api.default-visible: Whether to display dropdown by default
api.value: Currently selected item
api.label: The label of selected
api.change-on-select: Whether to allow selection of any level of options
api.formatter: Format the contents displayed in the input box,labels as the currently matched label array, selectedOptions as the currently selectedOption array, and vlaue as the current cascading value
api.no-match-text: Text that is displayed when there is no match for the search criteria
api.placeholder: The field placeholder text of Input
api.change: Triggered when the binding value changes
api.update:visible: Trigger when the drop-down box shows/hides
api.active-item-change: When change-on-select is false, it is triggered when the parent option changes and the parameter is an array of the parent items

drawer.component_desc: Used to display content on the same page.

api.visible: Controlled; Drawer display or not, can use v-model bidirectional binding data.
api.title: Drawer title, invalid if the header is customized using slot.
api.width: Drawer width, pixel for Number; unit for String.
api.height: Drawer height, used when placement is top or bottom.
api.closable: Whether to display the close button in the upper right corner and whether to support enter ESC to close.
api.mask-closable: Whether to allow the click mask layer to close.
api.destroy-on-close: Whether the child elements in the Drawer are destroyed when closed.
api.close: Click on the mask layer or the upper right fork of the event.
api.open: Triggered when a drawer is opened.

sidebar.component_desc: Used to show page structure and hierarchy

module1.title: Basic Style
module1.desc: The menu bar consists of menu bar items. Menu bar items can be divided into main menu bar and secondary menu bar. The main menu bar contains ICONS, text and expansion buttons, and the secondary menu bar is pure text

api.title: The name of the navigation
api.collapse: Support .sync, whether to fold the navigation horizontally
api.expand-keys: (Controlled), supports .sync, an array of keys that currently open the menu
api.default-expand-keys: The array of keys that currently open the menu
api.accordion: Whether to enable accordion mode. After the mode is enabled, no more than one can be opened at a time
api.data: Navigation data (including level 1 navigation and level 2 navigation)
api.tooltip-props: Tooltip component properties, see Tooltip Component for details
api.scoped-submenu: Customize the title content of the submenu
api.scoped-item: Customize the title content of a menu-item
api.collapse-change: Triggered when the sidebar expansion and collapse status changes
api.menu-expand-change: Triggered when the expansion status of a menu item changes
api.menu-item-click: Triggered when a menu item is clicked
api.data_id: The unique identity of the menu, which can be changed using the item-key property of the Sidebar component
api.data_tooltip: The content of the tooltip display
api.data_route: After configuring the modified attribute, router-link component is used for rendering. The optional value of this attribute is the same as the to attribute of the router-link component. See router-link for details
api.data_replace: The router-link replace attribute takes effect only when the Route attribute is configured
api.data_exact: This parameter takes effect only when the route attribute is configured, which is the same as the router-link exact attribute
api.data_href: Same as the a tag href attribute
api.data_target: Same as the target tag href attribute
api.data_rel: Same as the rel tag href attribute
api.data_enabledTooltip: Whether Tooltips can be displayed when menu items are disabled
